summary: Comprehensive testing of AetherX chatbot feature completed. Fixed critical bug where chatbot's position:fixed was broken due to 'perspective: 1000px' on body element. All 8 test features verified successfully.
passed_tests: Chatbot toggle button FIXED in viewport bottom-right corner (position stays consistent during scroll)
Chatbot visible when scrolling to middle and bottom of page
Chatbot button has floating animation (chatbot-float 3s) and glow animation (chatbot-glow 2s)
Chatbot button has pulsing rings animation (chatbot-pulse-ring)
Clicking chatbot button opens chat window with smooth animation
Chat window displays correctly with header (AetherX Assistant), messages area, and input field
Closing chat window works correctly (visibility hidden, opacity 0)
Chatbot responsive on mobile (375px) - button 54px, chat window fits screen
Chat API integration works - POST /api/chat returns AI response
Chat history API - GET and DELETE endpoints working
Newsletter API - subscribe and count endpoints working
critical_code_review_comments: BUG FIXED: Removed 'perspective: 1000px' from body in index.css - this CSS property creates a containing block that breaks position:fixed for child elements, causing chatbot to scroll with page instead of staying fixed to viewport
seed_data_creation: Test chat sessions created with TEST_ prefix and cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Chatbot fixed positioning issue was root-caused to CSS perspective property on body element. Fix applied to /app/frontend/src/index.css by removing perspective: 1000px. All chatbot features (fixed position, animations, chat API, mobile responsive) now working correctly.

rca_of_the_issue.root_cause: CSS 'perspective' property on body element in index.css creates a new containing block for fixed-positioned descendants, causing position:fixed to be relative to body instead of viewport
symptoms: Chatbot Y position changed during scroll (7567 -> 5294 -> 2268)
Chatbot was only visible when scrolled to bottom of page
getBoundingClientRect().top varied with scroll position instead of staying constant
rca_of_the_issue.verification: After fix, chatbot maintains consistent viewport position (~991px top) during scroll
